content: bewitching hour hat amethyst mermaidesigns the bewitching hour hat is a fun addition to any outfit the pattern is simple to allow for ultimate customization add on bundles will be made available for purchase so you can have the perfect hat for every occasion we ll be using continuous rounds so no joining or turning you ll need a stitch marker so you can mark the beginning of your rounds - 1 terms and abbreviations us terminology special stitches beg beginning chain chain sc3lo- work a single f/o fasten_off crochet into the repeat repeat backmost loop of a half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half double crochet skip skip slip_stitch slip_stitch space space st stitch rs right side ws wrong side ** indicates repeat - 2 materials needed yarn for my version i used red heart super saver which is a number 4 worsted weight acrylic i ve found that it holds up great for my costume items hook s h 5 00mm hook notions scissors stitch markers tapestry needle for weaving in ends notes we ll be starting at the tip of the hat and working our way down to the brim we ll add a decorative two color twisted border and some rosettes for the finishing touches you can easily adjust the hat for other sizes by making less row for example if you d like to make a mini hat you can stop at row 19 and skip to row 34 just note that your stitch counts will be different -
